name: Progress Bar Simulator DLC - H.O.R.S.E. 1st
summary:
A special thank you DLC to the community from the developers for those who want to support the game even more. 
 
It adds a GOLDEN HORSE to the game, shown on the main menu, the loading screen and the main game, that can be deactivated, if want. 
This DLC is purely cosmetic and a homage to Fallout (76) 1st subscription program and Oblivion's paid golden horse armor DLC.
